articles.author: Siddhant Adlakha
articles.title: Captain America: Brave New World Has Marvel’s Lamest Post-Credits Scene Yet - Vulture
articles.description: ‘Captain America: Brave New World’ has Marvel’s lamest post-credits scene yet. The studio seems to have lost its handle on the marketing art form it helped create.
articles.content: Marvel Studios has turned sitting through a movies credits into a competitive sport. Franchises you never thought would have (or need) post-credits teasers now pump them out regularly Transformers x … [+4650 chars]
